review:
When writing a good review for a dentist, it's important to highlight your positive experiences and specific details that made your visit satisfactory. Here's an example of a good review:

---

"I recently visited Dr. Bhavana dental office and had an outstanding experience Dr. Bhavana took the time to explain the procedure in detail, ensuring I felt comfortable and informed. The office was clean and equipped with the latest technology, which made the entire process smooth and efficient. I was particularly impressed with how gentle and thorough Dr. Bhavana was during the treatment. I highly recommend Dr. Bhavana to anyone looking for a compassionate and skilled dentist.\

I stumbled into Dr. Bhavana for an emergency and it was the best accident ever. Dentists are a personal nightmare for me, but this one may have changed that. If there's a delay, she gives you a heads up so you're not waiting endlessly. She is kind, gentle, patient and brilliant at her job. So happy to have found my new permanent dentist here :)

I went to Dr Bhavana fr my wisdom teeth. He was very friendly and explained me entire procedure very nicely. I was very scared but she made sure that I was relaxed by talking to me distracting me from the anxiety. I am scared of injections she was very good. I dint feel any pain. She first applied spray at injection site to numb the area. Everything went so easily i was scared of no reason. Dr bhavana did a very good job. Thank you‚ù§Ô∏è

I had a good experience with Dr.Bhavana. She will explain the procedure and the fix well and she will suggestions regarding the problem you are facing. Friendly to inform your concern. Good hospitality.

I went for the tooth extraction of my father. Dr. Bhavana is well experienced with her skill set and came up with such a benevolent and friendly approach . Along with assisting staff she was very much kind with behavior and understood the problem very well. My father is very much satisfied with her treatment and approach.

Dr Bhavana is very good kind hearted doctor.. and she will be very careful about her patient and Dr Bhavana treat as every patient like a family member.. that's the good quality of real doctor. I feel like Dr Bhavana is worth that .  She was given treatment to me for root canal and she did a great job.. all the best for your future Dr Bhavana madamüôèüòä
I was happy with the treatment and the clinic. The staff is very good and appointments were on time! Will highly recommended
